statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -4 \\ 3 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -4 \\ 2 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ -16 \\ 11 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 10 \\ 32 \\ -22 \\ -4 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
